title: If I get auto filled, give me at least a baning position
body:
Being auto filled sucks, but being auto filled and having to first pick sucks even worse. I am already on an unfamiliar role, why should I also have to give the enemy a chance to counter pick me AND not be able to ban something away that would make my time a bit easier? 

Yeah I can ask for a champ swap or a ban, but I don't get to make that final decision in the end. It is up to the rest of my team to be cooperative.

#If I get auto filled at least let me ban a champ.

replies.body: I mean, 99% of the time, autofill means support. Are you going to ban a support? That's not a great idea except in some very fringe cases.
Huh?  Just because you are playing support doesn't mean you have to ban a support.  A selfish ban for a support would probably be an ADC or a jungler.
i tend to ban {{champion:63}} {{champion:143}} "support" because they're super obnoxious for my teammates to lane against, aswell as deal with as the game goes on, currently.
{{champion:53}}
To be fair, all you need to do is dodge his Q and he's useless (yea, it's that useless advice again, but it works xD). For maximum safety you could pick a Sivir + Morgana botlane.

Actually Blitz is better when initiateing with W and E than trying to land a long range hook but with that initiation you cant ever know that your ally is gonna help you but if you pull them next to your ally they would have to be brain dead not to hit them.
also when you initiate with W E you can easily q from a shorter range as they try to run its a more reliable combo.
The problem with blitz is people ONLY rely on his Q hooks
True, but which support doesn't try to keep Blitz away from his teammates? Peeling is one of the supports many jobs after all.

yes and no as some characters can do it and others can try to do it and suck at it. (unless how everyone expects their examples to go their team is pro and the enemy team is bronze 4 even though matchmakeing puts teams with similar skill supposedly by useing mmr)
The problem is you can't reliably trust your lane partner to dodge it, even if you can.
That's where the Morgana comes into play, if you don't trust your teammate it's the best counterplay option you have.

{{champion:99}} and {{champion:25}} "support" are pretty annoying as well, not to mention I swear I can never get an ADC that knows to not walk into a Morgana Q. They see it and just have to take a closer look... and then ask me why their screen is grayed out.

As somebody has a lovely level 7 icon for Morgana among others... they also tend to complain that it shouldn't be possible to shoot that fat Q projectile through the middle of the minion wave. Or the other way around of "I totally dodged it! What do you mean the corner of my hitbox got grazed?!"
As someone who plays{{champion:111}}  and {{champion:412}} , there's no one more annoying than a taric
I keep getting filled top, kinda annoying actually (I put support/fill, going to swap to support/jg at this rate)
Sometimes a support ban can be good, for instance banning Morgana if you don't want them to have spell shield

http://champion.gg/champion/Blitzcrank/Support
??

Well if you wanna play Blitz or Thresh, you sorta.. have to ban Morgana. If your ADC isn't an Ezreal then you should ban Blitzcrank. You can't trust them to dodge hooks if you've never played with them before. Might wanna ban Soraka too, since ADCs hardly ever buy EC. That's 3 good bans right there.
Rofl wut, ive been autofilled less times to support than any other role??
Eh, I get bot and jug fairly frequently.  At least in flex queue.  I'll just fill and it seems to be the missing person of two groups of two people most of the time.
Actually, among people I know, it's about even between ADC and Support.
10 bans is coming soon supposedly, so this request is probably pointless.  Otherwise I'd support the idea.

Some Riot employee and SoonTM
Or, just don't autofill me during my placements, promos, or on a winning streak.

Promos I know for a fact you're safe from autofill.
Placements I think you are.

Winning streak? You're not allowed to have that. Riot doesn't allow your happiness.

Then again, what do I know, I'm a support main.
The thing with promos is you *personally* are safe from auto-fill but your teammates aren't. Heaven help you if its your jungle that gets auto-filled and doesn't have a clue.

>or on a winning streak.

Okay that one makes no sense. The other two you could easily argue for, but special treatment for a mere winning streak is just weird.

I had way too fucking many times last season when I was one win away from my promo series, and BOOM! "You have been autofilled as ADC." I tried trading, but nobody wanted to. Then, they ridiculed me with bullcrap like "/All Report noob ADC" when I simply didn't know how to be a marksman. No, I'm not joking. I've gotten autofilled as ADC.

How would you like to climb up the entire division, then get stopped short right before your promo series by some bullshit RNG that  determines that you should play as something that you're not in the mood for? Let's say you queued up as Top/JG, and got thrown into the clusterfuck that is bottom lane. And you didn't even get the easy-ass role of support. Noooo, Riot thinks that you should really learn how to play a marksman, which you happen to not have, and you're forced to try something. That's why I played {{champion:82}} bot lane. Because of fucking autofill. 

> a mere winning streak

As opposed to being tilted into oblivion by riot's bullshit autofill system.
you realize picking first is an advantage?

It has advantages, but it comes with disadvantages too.  There are quite a few champs who are suicidal first picks.  I love getting first pick when playing support (I can play almost anyone as a support, so I pick some off-the wall flex-pick like Lulu or Kayle and mind-game the enemy team), but I absolutely hate it if I'm top or mid because about 90% of the champs I can play there are obvious top/mid picks who are easy to counter-pick (like Nasus or Ziggs).
This is like what i was saying with support. more people would play it if they know a certain champion has ruined their last 5 games and they can guarentee a ban on it
Banning. A banning position. We're not talking about Batman villains here.
Yeah I noticed that, but it was too late to fix it.
Autofill is upsetting.
What happens though when several people are autofilled in the same match? Obviously that shouldn't happen, but matchmaking seems to be surprisingly stupid sometimes.
frankly I would rather be able to trade pick spots with a person then anything.  Because not everyone has all the champs and it allows for countering or not getting countered.
I've been requesting that fill/support should be guaranteed a ban for a while.

How about this... no autofill below Plat 3. Queue times are relatively low in lower divisions, so there is no reason for it to exist there. I can understand high Plat, Diamond, and so on that they need people to fill in for less desired roles, but at that point those people can play just about any roles to some degree. Lower elo? Pfft. "Vayne or I feed."

Another thing about autofill is not only do I hate support due to the incompetence of my team since I can't rely on them to carry me and the fact im their bitch, I suck at adc and if you don't get support, you get adc. One time I had so many dodges that the autofill went haywire and tried to fill me with every position. It will always bee those 2 roles unless by freak accident. If a blue moon occurrs on Friday the 13th, and all the planets are aligned, you will be filled in mid. That happened to me once and I actually got to play mid.
So ten bans are a thing, they will come out pretty soon.
Seems reasonable enough.
Agreed. +1
